
Optional action ...

It may be more reasonable to improve xgzip to handle such situation.

   >  PORT: omega.bkz has been fixed to make pfb files optimized.
	It just make 't1disasm' then 't1asm -b'.
	It may be reasonable to place it into 'port' directory.

   >  NOTE: We must use our t1asm, because it is corrected for 
	proper number of padded zeroes. 
        MikTeX includes buggy version of t1asm.
